_description: Thomas Hoccleve, Roundel to Henry Somer — fourteen lines

HunHM111.First Lines:
Somer þat rypest mannes sustenanceWith holsum hete of the
                    Sonnes warmnesse…
HunHM111.Last Lines:
…Is salue & oynement to hir seeknesseffor why we this shul
                    synge in CristemesseSomer þat rypest mannes sustenanceWith holsum
                    hete of the Sonnes warmnesseAl kynde of man thee holden is to
                    blesse
HunHM111.Attributed Title:
Cestes Balade & chanceon ensuyantz feurent faites a mon Meistre H
                        Somer quant il estoit Souztresorer (f. 38v)
